item.title: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）老板将投票决定是否允许私募基金投资球队
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）的所有者将就向私募股权基金出售其特许经营权的股份进行投票，这可能是职业体育联盟为吸引机构投资者而进行的一次转变。【原文：NFL owners are set to vote on selling stakes in their franchises to private equity, potentially joining a shift by professional sports leagues to attract institutional investors.】

item.title: 西班牙以国家安全为由，在欧尔班的担忧中取消了对火车制造商的竞标
item.description: 西班牙拒绝了匈牙利甘孜-马瓦格欧洲公司（Ganz-Mavag Europe Zrt.【原文：Spain has rejected a bid by Hungary’s Ganz-Mavag Europe Zrt. to buy train maker Talgo SA, saying the proposed deal could have compromised its strategic interests and threatened national security.】

item.title: 不仅仅是 "抄底者"：Aimco 见证私募股权二级交易热潮
item.description: 艾伯塔省公共养老金管理机构表示，小型投资者开始试水私募股权二级市场，从而为定价提供了更大的稳定性。【原文：Smaller investors are beginning to test the secondary market for private equity holdings, providing greater stability to pricing, according to Alberta’s public pension manager.】

item.title: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴金如何看待当前经济
item.description:
通胀是否仍有上行风险？【原文：

Is there still upside risk to inflation?

】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧寻求长期欧元债券，新债券发行日大丰收
item.description: 全球酒类生产商帝亚吉欧集团正在寻求新的长期欧元债券，作为丰厚的公司债券发行的一部分，欧洲一级市场上的新债发行将更上一层楼。【原文：Global alcohol maker Diageo Plc is seeking new long dated euro debt as part of a bumper corporate bond offering, with new issuance stepping up a gear in Europe’s primary market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特希望获得更多数据以决定 9 月是否降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，他正在等待更多信息，然后再决定是否支持下月降息。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member member Klaas Knot said he’s awaiting more information before deciding on whether to support an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 需求激增，意大利电价攀升至 2023 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于需求激增，意大利的电力价格攀升至九个月来的最高点，该国对天然气的依赖程度有所下降。【原文：Italian power prices climbed to a nine-month high as demand surges, and the nation falls back on its reliance on gas.】

item.title: 欧洲央行森特诺称利率路径似乎 "相对清晰
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺表示，鉴于通胀率降低等指标，货币政策的方向似乎 "很明确"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Mario Centeno said the direction of monetary policy seems “clear” given indicators such as lower inflation.】

item.title: 匈牙利在通胀飙升、福林下跌后暂停降息
item.description: 匈牙利中央银行一年多来首次维持关键利率不变，此前通胀率飙升，福林走软。决定公布后，匈牙利福林升值。【原文：Hungary’s central bank kept the key interest rate unchanged for the first time in more than a year, following a jump in inflation and a weakening of the forint. The currency gained after the decision.】

item.title: 中国钢铁业颓势显现必和必拓看好铜业的原因
item.description:
全球最大的矿商押注重要的新能源金属，以帮助抵消铁矿石收益的下降。【原文：

World’s biggest miner bets on the crucial new-energy metal to help offset declining returns from iron ore.

】

item.title: 前巴克莱财富主管因误导监察机构而被禁止任职
item.description: 前巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）财富主管汤姆-卡拉里斯（Tom Kalaris）在伦敦一家法院宣布，他在被问及该银行与卡塔尔有争议的集资问题时行为不诚实，因此他失去了获准在英国金融业工作的机会。【原文：Former Barclays Plc wealth head Tom Kalaris lost his bid to gain approval to work in UK finance after a London court declared that he’d acted dishonestly when quizzed about the bank’s controversial capital raising with Qatar.】

item.title: T-Bill and Chill "是投资者难以改掉的习惯
item.description: 一年多来，这一直是不费吹灰之力就能实现的终极目标：把钱存入超级安全的国库券，赚取超过 5%的收益率，冲洗并重复。或者像亿万富翁债券投资者杰弗里-冈德拉克去年 10 月所说的那样，"国库券和寒意"。【原文：It’s been the ultimate no-brainer for more than a year: Park your money in super-safe Treasury bills, earn yields of more than 5%, rinse and repeat. Or as billionaire bond investor Jeffrey Gundlach put it last October, “T-bill and chill.”】

item.title: 中国宝钢上半年利润稳定后面临压力
item.description: 全球最大的钢铁生产商宝山钢铁股份有限公司（Baoshan Iron & Steel Co.【原文：Baoshan Iron & Steel Co., the listed unit of the world’s biggest steel producer, warned of growing pressures on the industry after reporting profit that held up relatively well in the first half of 2024.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长结称收紧财政政策可抑制物价
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）说，"不恰当的财政立场 "阻碍了货币政策应对通货膨胀的有效性。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member member Klaas Knot said an “inappropriate fiscal stance” has hampered the effectiveness of monetary policy to tackle inflation.】

item.title: Zee 和索尼印度公司就合并交易失败的法律纠纷达成和解
item.description: Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. 宣布与索尼影视网络印度公司的法律纠纷达成和解后，其股价大涨，最终拉开了因合并失败而引发的公司争斗的帷幕。【原文：Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd.’s shares rallied after it announced the settlement of its legal dispute with Sony Pictures Networks India, finally pulling the curtains down on a corporate battle over a failed merger that would have created a media giant.】

item.title: 印尼售出史上最长 40 年期债券，宽松中枢渐行渐近
item.description: 印度尼西亚首次出售 40 年期本币债券，因为迫在眉睫的降息增加了较长期限债务的吸引力。【原文：Indonesia sold 40-year local-currency bonds for the first time as looming interest-rate cuts boost the allure of longer-tenor debt.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。 由于市场在等待本周晚些时候的关键财报和数据，股市交投清淡。石油和中国经济的健康状况前景黯淡。天舞传媒（Skydance Media）将拥有派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global），结束了一场戏剧性的收购角逐。以下是市场正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks trading is muted as markets await key earnings and data later in the week. The outlook is souring for oil and the health of the Chinese economy. And Skydance Media is set to own Paramount Global, ending a dramatic acquisition contest. Here’s what markets are talking about. — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 欧洲需求疲软，瑞士制造商销售额下降
item.description: 今年上半年，由于瑞士法郎坚挺以及瑞士最重要的出口市场--欧洲需求疲软，瑞士制造业收入下滑。【原文：The Swiss manufacturing sector saw revenues slump in the first half of the year as firms suffer from the strong franc and weak demand in Europe, its most important export market.】

item.title: 美国称在南海护航菲律宾船只是一种选择
item.description: 据一位高级军事官员称，在有争议的南中国海与中国船只频繁发生冲突之际，美国愿意陪同菲律宾船只前往南中国海。【原文：The US is willing to accompany Philippine vessels in the disputed South China Sea amid recurring confrontations with Chinese ships, according to a senior military official.】

item.title: Endeavour 与买家 Lilium 解决非洲金矿争端
item.description: Endeavour Mining Plc 和 Lilium Mining 就出售两个非洲金矿的法律诉讼达成和解，资产将移交给布基纳法索政府。【原文：Endeavour Mining Plc and Lilium Mining settled legal proceedings over the sale of two African gold mines, with the assets to be transferred to the Burkina Faso government.】

item.title: 隆基提高太阳能硅片价格，试图结束价格战
item.description: 中国最大的太阳能硅片生产商周二提高了价格，表示希望能使整个行业摆脱价格战，因为价格战已导致一些公司破产。【原文：China’s biggest solar wafer producer raised prices on Tuesday, saying it hoped to jolt the industry out of a price war that’s sent some firms into bankruptcy.】

item.title: Heimstaden Bostad 自 2022 年初以来首次出售债券
item.description: 瑞典房东 Heimstaden Bostad AB 两年半来首次重返本国的公共债券市场，因为去年曾陷入动荡的房地产业的融资条件继续改善。【原文：Swedish landlord Heimstaden Bostad AB has returned to the public bond markets in its home country for the first time in two-and-a-half years as funding conditions continue to improve for a sector that was in turmoil last year.】

item.title: 瑞银称，大陆集团分拆后可能会有 50%的市值回归
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，如果德国汽车零部件制造商大陆集团（Continental AG）将其陷入困境的汽车部门分拆出去，那么股东的现金回报可能会激增。【原文：If German car-parts maker Continental AG goes through with spinning off its struggling automotive division, cash returns to shareholders could soar, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 以太币落后于比特币，原因是供应担忧和记名币令投资者恐慌
item.description: 以太币继续落后于领先的加密货币比特币，因为最近推出的交易所交易基金未能激发对排名第二的代币的更大需求。【原文：Ether continues to lag behind leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin as recently-debuted exchange-traded funds fail to kindle greater demand for the second-ranked token.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长坚持 "更高更长久 "的政策
item.description: 捷克央行行长 Ales Michl 表示，捷克央行正在降低借贷成本，但决策者将继续保持高于过去 10 年的利率水平。【原文：The Czech central bank is in the process of lowering borrowing costs but policymakers will keep interest rates higher than what they used to be over the past 10 years, according to Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: 首次公开募股希望者的两难选择：挤进秋季窗口还是等待 25 年
item.description: 随着秋季首次公开募股窗口的打开，渴望上市的公司面临着艰难的抉择：是在市场接近历史高点时跃跃欲试，还是等到明年利率和美国大选风险消退后再出手。【原文：Companies itching to go public face a tough choice as the fall IPO window opens: take the leap with markets near all-time highs, or wait until next year when risks around interest rates and the US election have faded.】

item.title: 安踏宣布回购 13 亿美元股票以巩固股价
item.description: 中国体育用品制造商安踏体育用品有限公司周二表示，将斥资最多100亿港元（12.8亿美元）回购多达10%的股份。【原文：Chinese sportswear maker ANTA Sports Products Ltd. said on Tuesday it will spend up to HK$10 billion ($1.28 billion) to repurchase as much as 10% of its shares.】

item.title: 碧桂园考虑进一步推迟偿还人民币债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司告诉一些投资者，该公司正在考虑进一步延长部分人民币债券的支付期限，因为长期的销售低迷加剧了这家中国开发商的财务压力。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. told some investors that it is considering further extending payments on some of its yuan bonds, according to people familiar with the matter, as a prolonged sales slump adds to the Chinese developer’s financial stress.】

item.title: 降息周期可能是这样的
item.description:
下一个大问题。【原文：

The next big question.

】

item.title: Klarna 首席执行官通过 Flat Capital 投资埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司
item.description: Klarna Bank AB 联合创始人兼首席执行官塞巴斯蒂安-西米亚特科夫斯基（Sebastian Siemiatkowski）正通过他的瑞典投资公司 Flat Capital AB 向 SpaceX 投资。【原文：Klarna Bank AB co-founder and chief executive officer Sebastian Siemiatkowski is putting money into SpaceX through his Swedish investment firm Flat Capital AB.】
